amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to terminate certain energy tax subsidies and lower the corporate income tax rate.

action.text: Amendment SA 1589 proposed by Senator Coats for Senator DeMint.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1589, under the order of 3/7/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 26 - 72. Record Vote Number: 40.
